items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good.
items.body: Cute. You will need a bra for support because fabric is stretchy however the bad dips down just a bit and bra is noticeable. Not sure about the length, sort of odd and thick at the bottom. Very comfortable. I dont feel snatched in this. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful

items.author: kimk453

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great dress at a great price
items.body: This is a nice dress. I always wanted a sequined dress. I picked this up and I currently don’t have an occasion coming up but I hope to have a reason to wear it soon! I ordered a small and the dark green. The dress itself must be a black velvet with dark green sequins on top because the coloring of the dress is very dark. The good thing about this is that it will nicely cover boob tape and underwear lines. It’s also very slimming. You can adjust the straps of the dress on the back the same way you would with a bra. This slit up the leg is a really nice touch and great placement. The length is good. The downside of this dress are the straps do not feel great quality but this isn’t something you’re going to wear every week so I think they’ll hold up just fine for several wears. The upper bust area has slightly extra fabric but my bust is small so this is probably to accommodate larger sizes. I can easily adjust this with fashion tape or even a simple stitch. Again, the dark black base fabric hides everything so I can hide stitching and no one would know. I really like this dress and I think they’ll hold up price is very fair and this is a great value. I have paid way more for Less. I highly recommend this dress Read more
items.author: Super Shopper Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glamorous Burgundy Sequin Dress That Commands Attention
items.body: I purchased the Wenrine Women’s Sparkly Sequin Dress in burgundy, and I was blown away by how elegant and striking it looks in person. This is one of those dresses that instantly makes you feel confident and glamorous the moment you put it on. From the rich color to the shimmering sequins and the dramatic high slit, it’s designed to stand out at any formal event. Design and Appearance The design of this dress is absolutely gorgeous. The spaghetti straps give it a delicate, feminine look, while the V neckline adds just the right amount of allure without being over the top. The burgundy shade is deep, bold, and very flattering on different skin tones it looks especially beautiful under evening lighting where the sequins catch and reflect light from every angle. The high slit is the standout feature, adding drama and sophistication, while also making the dress easier to walk in. It strikes a perfect balance between sexy and classy. Fit and Comfort One of the best parts of this dress is how it fits. It’s form-fitting in all the right places, hugging curves while still offering enough stretch to be comfortable. I didn’t feel restricted moving, walking, or even dancing in it, which is rare for a sequin gown. The slit adds not only style but also practicality, since it allows for easier movement. The adjustable straps are a thoughtful detail because they make it easier to get the neckline just right. The inner lining is soft, so the sequins never feel scratchy against the skin. Quality and Details The quality of this dress exceeded my expectations. The sequins are securely sewn and don’t fall off easily like cheaper dresses. The stitching is clean, and the overall construction feels sturdy. The material has a good weight to it, which helps the dress drape nicely without riding up or feeling flimsy. The inner lining prevents transparency and adds comfort, while the outer sequins give it that red carpet sparkle effect. Occasions and Styling This dress is perfect for so many events formal parties, weddings, galas, New Year’s Eve, or even a night out at an upscale club. Because it’s already such a statement piece, it doesn’t need heavy accessorizing. A pair of strappy heels, a clutch bag, and simple jewelry are all you need to complete the look. I paired mine with black heels and a small rhinestone clutch, which complimented the sparkle of the dress without overpowering it. For a cooler night, it can also be styled with a sleek shawl or faux fur wrap for extra elegance. Practical Benefits Even though this dress is all about glamour, it’s surprisingly practical. The stretch fabric allows you to sit and move comfortably, the slit keeps it from feeling too restrictive, and the sequins hold up well without snagging easily. The dress also doesn’t require much effort to look good once it’s on, you already look styled and put together. Final Thoughts The Wenrine burgundy sequin dress is a showstopper. It’s sexy, elegant, well made, and comfortable enough to wear all evening. The sparkling sequins, flattering cut, and dramatic slit make it the kind of dress that turns heads and photographs beautifully. If you want a dress that makes you feel confident, powerful, and glamorous, this is it. I highly recommend it !!!! Read more
items.author: Moni Chynnaaa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly sequin dress
items.body: This is a very beautiful sparkly sequin dress. The color is a nice maroon/wine red. I love the color and the sparkles. It looks just like the picture. I ordered my usual size small but unfortunately it didn't fit well on me. The bust area was too large and loose (I'm quite small and petite) It features adjustable straps which is a nice feature but that didn't help me get it to fit any better. The material is somewhat stretchy and is a nice velvety material. It is somewhat heavy and seems to be well made. It is comfortable for the most part, besides rubbing on the sequins which can irritate skin and be quite annoying. I had high hopes for this beautiful looking dress but I don't think it looks very good on me. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Backless
items.body: I absolutely love the Wenrine Women’s Sparkly Sequin Dress! The fit is stunning—super flattering and comfy with the spaghetti straps and deep V-neck. The sequins give it just the right amount of sparkle without being overwhelming, and the high slit adds a fun, sexy touch. It’s perfect for a night out or any special occasion. Definitely a showstopper! Read more
items.author: LeBon #26

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Rose Red, Gold, Blue, Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
